name: Preventive Measure of Washington Dc, LLC

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Preventive Measure of Washington Dc, LLC is a Community/Behavioral Health provider based in Washington, DC. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $85.4M in Medicaid payments across 995K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $85.4M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
